thread.title: Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks
thread.title_full: Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks

title: Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks
text:
Sports Ovechkin misses morning skate; game-time decision vs Sharks Washington Capitals left wing Alex Ovechkin (8), from Russia, watches as his goal gets past New Jersey Devils goalie Keith Kinkaid (1) during the third period of an NHL hockey game, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Washington. The Capitals won ... more > By - Associated Press   
WASHINGTON (AP) - Capitals coach Barry Trotz says captain Alex Ovechkin will be a game-time decision against the San Jose Sharks. 
Ovechkin missed Washington’s morning skate ahead of Tuesday night’s game for personal reasons. 
No other details were given. 
Ovechkin is a three-time NHL MVP who led the league with 53 goals last season. 
He had a goal and an assist in Washington’s season-opening 5-3 victory over New Jersey on Saturday.
